description: “I have been working with Victor in an Agile POD since February 2023. During our work, Victor was involved in a significant variety of development projects for a credit system. Victor was always demonstrating teamwork, technical collaboration with other team members (quality analysts, business analysts, and his peer developers), curiosity, and timely delivery of assignments. Victor also has been fully involved in Agile sprint planning, sprint reviews, sprint demos, daily stand-up meetings, and in creating project artifacts using Jira and Confluence.”

“Victor is an outstanding technologist known for his exceptional work ethic. His dedication and ability to go above and beyond make him an invaluable asset to any team. Victor consistently delivers high-quality work, and his problem-solving skills shine in tackling complex challenges. In addition to his technical capabilities, Victor's communication and leadership abilities set him apart. He effortlessly collaborates with colleagues, skillfully conveying complex technical concepts.”

“Victor has a very strong work ethic and any company would be lucky to have him. When we were first working together we were put on a team to innovate and his ideas were invaluable. To add to this, he is an excellent addition to the team as he is a pleasure to work with and is a great team player. His technical skills are excellent as well as he has shown the ability to solve complex problems. I wouldn’t hesitate for a second to recommend him for a software engineering position at any company.”
